_comment: Created by hdorning on 23/08/2017 15:41:16 using v2.7
title: How many patients are affected by delayed transfers of care and how has this changed?
analysis_commentary:
The number of delayed transfer of care beds decreased from 3,602 in April 2011 to 5,905 in April 2017. During the time period measued, the number of delayed beds ranged from a minimum of 3,473 in December 2012 and maximum of 6,645 in February 2017.

Updated July 2017.
